app.title: PKU Tools
app.long-description: This app is aimed at people with PKU. It combines a calculator, pencil, paper and nutritional table.
app.auth-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try it again. Always use the same login method.
app.license: Free use is limited due to server and database costs. Support with a subscription for unlimited entries:
app.info: Phe Log now has a date picker and food is automatically saved to a specific day. You can also add or edit food entries in the Phe Diary and track your energy intake in kilocalories (kcal)! ðŸ™Œ ðŸŽ‰ ðŸ˜ƒ

home.title: Home
home.suggestion: Can be installed on any device (Android, iOS, Mac, Windows).
home.about-title: From the idea to the app
home.about-description: From the developer of one of the first PKU apps for Android "Phe Rechner", as well as PKU Manager. Development of PKU apps since 2013.

phe-search.title: Phe Search
phe-search.source: Source: USDA, FoodData Central, 2019 (fdc.nal.usda.gov). As an example, this is also used for nutritional information in the Google sidebar.
phe-search.search-info: Refine your search with several words, e.g. "apples raw" or "potatoes cooked". Source: fdc.nal.usda.gov

protein-calculator.title: Protein Calculator
protein-calculator.description: Calculate approximate phe values from protein.

barcode-scanner.title: Barcode Scanner
barcode-scanner.info: Phe gets calculated from protein. Source: openfoodfacts.org
barcode-scanner.error: Something went wrong. If the error occurs again, try restarting the app.

own-food.title: Own Food
own-food.description: Save own food and phe values.
own-food.limit: Own Food is limited to 250 entries.
own-food.search-info: Own food is also available in the search.

phe-log.title: Phe Log
phe-log.description: Log phe values throughout the day.
phe-log.save-diary: Save in Phe Diary and reset Phe Log
phe-log.info: Use the tools in the navigation bar to add food.

phe-diary.title: Phe Diary
phe-diary.description: Log phe values over several days.
phe-diary.limit: The Phe Diary is limited to 100 entries. Export your data in Excel. For deletion, see settings.
phe-diary.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.

lab-values.title: Lab Values
lab-values.limit: Lab Values are limited to 50 entries. Export your data in Excel. For deletion, see settings.
lab-values.chart-info: The chart gets displayed after the second entry.
lab-values.unit-info: Unit can be changed in the settings.

settings.title: Settings
settings.license-text: Unlimited entries and priority support with
settings.delete-account-info: Only works if the last login was not too long ago. Please log out once and log in again.
settings.delete-account-error: Unfortunately this did not work. Try logging out and back in again.

email-auth.title: Sign in with Email
email-auth.name: Name
email-auth.reset-note: Receive an email to reset the password.
email-auth.password-sent: Email for password reset has been sent. Please check your emails.

help.title: Help
help.description: Help and FAQ for PKU Tools.
help.install-p1: This web app can be installed on any device like an app.
help.install-p3: In Safari, tap the share button and then "Add to Home Screen".
help.install-p4: Click the little installation icon in the address bar in Chrome, Brave or Edge.

features.calculator-description: Calculate the amount of Phe for a specific weight or convert protein to Phe.
features.own-food-description: Save your own foods for quick addition.
features.diary-description: Keep track of your food and monitor your Phe tolerance.
features.lab-values-description: Track laboratory values in a diagram.

assistant.title: Assistant
assistant.satiety-tip-high: Consider foods with less Phe for satiety. Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is higher than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
assistant.satiety-tip-low: You could include foods with slightly more Phe within your limits. Your Phe intake ({phePercentage}%) is lower than your calorie intake ({kcalPercentage}%).
assistant.satiety-tip-good: Great! Your Phe to calorie ratio is well balanced today.
assistant.previous-day-low: Yesterday's Phe intake was quite low. Consider including more Phe-containing foods today.
assistant.previous-day-high: You exceeded your Phe goal yesterday. Try to include fewer Phe-containing foods today.
assistant.previous-day-good: You maintained a good Phe intake yesterday. Keep it up!
assistant.lab-values-high: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is above the target range. Try to strictly adhere to your Phe limits in the coming days.
assistant.lab-values-low: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is below the target range. Talk to your doctor about potentially including more Phe in your diet.
assistant.lab-values-good: Your last Phe value of {phe} {unit} is in the good range. Keep it up!
assistant.lab-values-tyrosine-low: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is low. Make sure to take your amino acid mixture regularly.
assistant.lab-values-tyrosine-high: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is elevated. Discuss the dosage of your amino acid mixture with your doctor.
assistant.lab-values-tyrosine-good: Your last Tyrosine value of {tyrosine} {unit} is in the good range.
assistant.streak: Amazing! You've tracked your nutrition for {streak} days in a row!
assistant.week: That's a whole week of commitment!
assistant.start-tracking: Start tracking your nutrition daily to build a streak and get personalized insights!
assistant.phe-diary-stats: In the last 14 days, your average Phe intake was {average} mg. The average deviation from optimum was {deviation}%.
assistant.phe-stats-average: In the last 14 days, your average Phe intake was {average} mg.
assistant.phe-stats-deviation: The average deviation from optimum is {deviation}%.

badges.streak-description: Currently {days} of 5 days in a row
badges.history-description: {days} of 10 days in the last 2 weeks
